introduction: Today we're discussing how 2b2t's latest item dupe has Minecraft furious, as a simple exploit led to

vocabulary.definition: to duplicate or replicate something, especially in an unauthorized manner
vocabulary.example: The players discovered a way to dupe rare items on the server.

vocabulary.definition: to take advantage of a vulnerability or weakness in a system for personal gain
vocabulary.example: The exploit allowed players to gain an unfair advantage in the game.

vocabulary.definition: the most effective strategies or trends in a particular context, such as gaming
vocabulary.example: Players adapted quickly to the new PVP meta after the exploit was discovered.

vocabulary.definition: to watch over, supervise, or manage a process or situation
vocabulary.example: The admin had to oversee the server to ensure fair gameplay.

vocabulary.definition: showing no activity, growth, or development
vocabulary.example: The server's combat system had become stagnant until the new exploit was found.

vocabulary.definition: not based on or conforming to what is generally done or believed
vocabulary.example: The players' unconventional methods led to the discovery of the powerful exploit.
